thread.title: Forget planking, everybody's pretending to be a frozen chicken now
thread.title_full: WTF | Forget planking, everybody's pretending to be a frozen chicken now - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Forget planking, everybody's pretending to be a frozen chicken now
text:
Did you enjoy and partake in planking?
Want a new one of making a complete and utter t** of yourself on social media? Congratulations, frozen chook is exactly what you've been looking for.
Simply put, frozen chook is the latest in a stream of social experiments / performance art pieces / ways to spot people you should unfriend on Facebook. In an attempt to mimic a frozen chicken, people strip down in unusual places and contort themselves in various ways.
The trend began in rural New Zealand, however thanks to social media, it's begun to spread like wildfire and dumbasses copycats have sprung up across the globe.
Here's an example.
 yoga #frozenchook
Posted by Frozenchook on Monday, 5 October 2015 And another.
 Tegals delivering some #frozenchook to KFC to make some shit yarn popcorn chicken
Posted by Frozenchook on Monday, 5 October 2015 And another.
 Chook in trough #frozenchook
Posted by Frozenchook on Monday, 5 October 2015 Oh, and another.
 No need to season this one boys, a cook-in-bag all-in-one easy dinner #frozenchook
Posted by Frozenchook on Tuesday, 6 October 2015 At the risk of sounding like a spoilsport or dryshite, this has got to be one of the stupidest things we've seen yet. All it'd take is someone to steal their clothes while your co-conspirator takes the picture of you.
Or better yet, they can set your clothes on fire and leave you there.
Now THAT'd be hilarious.
Via Facebook
